name: Spooky Cake
description:
A witch academy where everything went out of control, collect potions and tomes but beware, reality will collapse. Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Controls:

Jump: Space Bar

Wall Jump: Space Bar (No direction needed)

Dash: F

Quit: Alt-F4

Art by:

  • Fernando Castillo https://www.instagram.com/armynblaster/
  • Ian Genskowsky

Programming and Level Design:

  • Lucas Lizama
